original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 845: The Sticky Spaghetti Gauge
original_content:
This week Jonathan and Randal talk Flutter and Dart! Is Google killing Flutter? Whats the challenge Randal sees in training new senior developers, and whats the solution? Listen to find out!


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.
Places to follow the FLOSS Weekly Podcast:

title: - FlutterとDartの未来：GoogleはFlutterを殺すのか？
body: 今週の話題はFlutterとDart。Googleの未来や新開発者育成の課題に迫る。
titles: - FlutterとDartの未来：GoogleはFlutterを殺すのか？
- 新しいシニア開発者の育成における課題と解決策
- FLOSS Weeklyポッドキャストのエピソードを見逃すな！
